description: Header file declaring functions for managing monitor update lists in the OvsDbApi module, including adding, processing, removing, and clearing monitor entries. It includes necessary external headers and defines function prototypes related to monitor list management.

methods.name: mon_list_add
methods.description: Adds a monitor to the list with a specified UUID and callback function.

methods.name: mon_list_process
methods.description: Processes monitor list entries based on UUID and table configuration.

methods.name: mon_list_remove
methods.description: Removes a monitor from the list by UUID.

methods.name: mon_list_clear
methods.description: Clears all monitor entries from the list.
